Package com.adeptions.clarguments

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArgumentValueConverter<T>
    Interface for converting incoming raw string arg values to appropriate type
    ArgumentValueValidator<T>
    Interface for validating values
    BadArgExceptionsHandler
    Interface for handling BadArgException during parsing
    BadArgReason  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArgName
    Represents an arg name found during parsing
    ArgsParsingOptions
    The options to be used when parsing args
    ArgumentDefinitions
    Represents a list of argument definitions and provides methods for parsing args
    Arguments
    Represents the arguments after parsing
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ArgumentDefinitionType
    Enumerator for defining the different type of argument VALUED - the argument has a name and value FLAG - the argument is just a flag (has no value) INFORMATIONAL - the argument is an informational flag (has no value and the application may want to halt normal execution and show some information when the argument is encountered - e.g.
    PredefinedBadArgReasons
    Enumerator to define the categorized reasons for args parsing exceptions (BadArgException)
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadArgException
    Thrown to indicate that some problem was encountered during args parsing
    BadArgumentDefinitionException
    Thrown to indicate that some problem was encountered during the definition of an argument or creating a collection of argument definitions.
